name: Orphan to Mage
description:
I made this game for my university course focused on game design. It's a FMV (full motion videogame) in my made-up world.

The story takes place in a fantasy world, that was flooded due to a colossal catastrophe 2500 years ago called the Great Flood, where people supposedly opened up a portal to another world in hopes to find supplies there. Because of the monsters that came during the great flood, it is very dangerous to travel between the islands, and because of the knowledge (including magic) and technology lost during the Great Flood, most people don't even know where the other islands are. Only a handful of people who call themselves adventurers have information about the locations of certain islands.

You are an orphan that dreams of becoming the first mage after so many years...
